00011 # /* See http://www.boost.org for most recent version. */
00012 #
00013 # ifndef BOOST_PREPROCESSOR_CONFIG_CONFIG_HPP
00014 # define BOOST_PREPROCESSOR_CONFIG_CONFIG_HPP
00015 #
00016 # /* BOOST_PP_CONFIG_FLAGS */
00017 #
00018 # define BOOST_PP_CONFIG_STRICT() 0x0001
00019 # define BOOST_PP_CONFIG_IDEAL() 0x0002
00020 #
00021 # define BOOST_PP_CONFIG_MSVC() 0x0004
00022 # define BOOST_PP_CONFIG_MWCC() 0x0008
00023 # define BOOST_PP_CONFIG_BCC() 0x0010
00024 # define BOOST_PP_CONFIG_EDG() 0x0020
00025 #
00026 # ifndef BOOST_PP_CONFIG_FLAGS
00027 #    if defined(__SPIRIT_PP__) || defined(__MWERKS__) && __MWERKS__ >= 0x3200
00028 #        define BOOST_PP_CONFIG_FLAGS() (BOOST_PP_CONFIG_STRICT())
00029 #    elif defined(__EDG__) || defined(__EDG_VERSION__)
00030 #        define BOOST_PP_CONFIG_FLAGS() (BOOST_PP_CONFIG_EDG() | BOOST_PP_CONFIG_STRICT())
00031 #    elif defined(__MWERKS__)
00032 #        define BOOST_PP_CONFIG_FLAGS() (BOOST_PP_CONFIG_MWCC())
00033 #    elif defined(__BORLANDC__) || defined(__IBMC__) || defined(__IBMCPP__) || defined(__SUNPRO_CC)
00034 #        define BOOST_PP_CONFIG_FLAGS() (BOOST_PP_CONFIG_BCC())
00035 #    elif defined(_MSC_VER)
00036 #        define BOOST_PP_CONFIG_FLAGS() (BOOST_PP_CONFIG_MSVC())
00037 #    else
00038 #        define BOOST_PP_CONFIG_FLAGS() (BOOST_PP_CONFIG_STRICT())
00039 #    endif
00040 # endif
00041 #
00042 # /* BOOST_PP_CONFIG_EXTENDED_LINE_INFO */
00043 #
00044 # ifndef BOOST_PP_CONFIG_EXTENDED_LINE_INFO
00045 #    define BOOST_PP_CONFIG_EXTENDED_LINE_INFO 0
00046 # endif
00047 #
00048 # /* BOOST_PP_CONFIG_ERRORS */
00049 #
00050 # ifndef BOOST_PP_CONFIG_ERRORS
00051 #    ifdef NDEBUG
00052 #        define BOOST_PP_CONFIG_ERRORS 0
00053 #    else
00054 #        define BOOST_PP_CONFIG_ERRORS 1
00055 #    endif
00056 # endif
00057 #
00058 # endif
